name: Blitz
body: ### What is Blitz Blitz is a *light-weighted* *restful* Framework based on *Spring Framework* and *Servlet*.You can use Blitz to build a site with MVC style easily and add restful features to it. ####Why is the framwwork called Blitz? Because,it can handler requests very fast and efficiently. Lama is a sub-project of Blitz. It is based on java's annotation feature. We use @ to mark a *DAO* and the Lama will autowire the interface. ####why is it called *Lama*? Because my girl friend like the animal = =. ``` $ cd your_repo_root/repo_name $ git init $ git clone git@github.com:laxser/Blitz.git ``` 大功告成～ ###Quick Start ####How? 在web.ini中加入以下代码 ```xml blitzFilter com.laxser.blitz.BlitzFilter blitzFilter /* REQUEST FORWARD INCLUDE ``` ###A little bit further ####若要控制并发 ```xml portalExecutorCorePoolSize 200 ``` ####需要使用Log4j查看日志 ```xml org.springframework.web.util.Log4jConfigListener ``` ####配置忽略Blitz 的模块的方法,在Blitz需要被忽略的模块中配置一个blitz-info.properties ``` blitz.ignore=true ``` ###现在 你已经轻松的完成了Blitz平台的搭建～ ###Hello World ####1. 编写HelloWorldController 放在Controllers包下面 ```java import com.laxser.blitz.web.Invocation; import com.laxser.blitz.web.annotation.Path; import com.laxser.blitz.web.annotation.rest.Get; @Path("helloworld") public class FriendController { @Get public String sayHelloWorld(Invocation inv) { return "@Hello world"; } } ``` 然后，访问 http://localhost:8080/XXX/helloworld ### Authors and Contributors Blitz, also its DAO (Lama) was commited by @laxser.You may interested to go to his blog:http://laxser.wordpress.com ### Support or Contact Blitz is absolutely *100% pure java and 100%* open-source with *No warranty*. But you may contact @laxser (duqifan@gmail.com) for suggestions and etc. I will reply to you ASAP. please refer to the README for more information
tagline: A restful high performance light-weighted  java framework based on spring,
